name: Fresh Corn Salad
keywords: corn, green pepper, red bell pepper, gluten-free, side dish
recipeIngredient: 18 ears fresh corn, husk and silk removed
3 large red bell peppers, cut into 1/2-inch dice
3 large green peppers, cut into 1/2-inch dice
1 pint cherry tomatoes, sliced in half
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the corn off the cobs into a very large bowl. In a large pot, bring about 2 quarts of water to boil. Add the corn kernels and cover. Bring to a boil and cook 4 minutes, stirring the corn once every minute and removing silk or husks. Drain and refresh under cold water. Put the corn in a large serving bowl with the remaining vegetables. Add the oil. Toss well. Add the vinegar and salt and pepper to taste and mix well. Marinate 1 to 2 hours.
